Fourth visit for baby 
A. History-taking
Ask the mother the following:
/circle6 Has the baby received all the vaccines recommended so far? 
/circle6 Is the baby taking breastfeeds well?
/circle6 How much weight has the baby gained?
/circle6 Does the baby have any kind of problem?
